import React from "react"; import "../Rest_filter_link/Rest_filter_link.css" import "../Filter_rest_options/Filter_rest_options.css" import NavButton from "../NavButton_nav/NavButton"; import vectorDown from "../../../assets/icons/Vector-filter-down.svg" import { useState } from "react"; import AllRestaurants from "../../All_restaurants/All_restaurants"; const FilterRestOptions: React.FC = () => { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggleModal = () => { setModal(!modal); }; const handleAddRest = async (event:any) => { event.preventDefault() const linkImg = event.target[0].value const restName = event.target[1].value const chefName = event.target[2].value const rating1 = event.target[3].che const rating2 = event.target[4].value const rating3 = event.target[5].value const rating4 = event.target[6].value const rating5 = event.target[7].value const openHours = event.target[8].value const openHours2 = event.target[9].value const address = event.target[10].value const popular = event.target[11].value const popular2 = event.target[11].value const isNew = event.target[13].value console.log(event, linkImg, restName, chefName, rating1, rating2,rating3,rating4,rating5, openHours,openHours2, address, popular, popular2, isNew) } const allRest = document.getElementById('all-rest-page-container') if(modal) { document.body.classList.add('active-modal') allRest!.style.display = 'none'; } else { document.body.classList.remove('active-modal') // allRest!.style.display = 'grid'; } return ( <>
{modal && (
